short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add and manage suffixes that will be appended to each of the questions that you ask ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you add suffixes that will be sent along with every one of the questions that you ask ChatGPT.
